example.eg: This company is the sponsor of the national rugby team.
example.egtrans: 这家公司是国家橄榄球队的赞助商。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 赞助者，资助人, 主办者，发起人

dsense.name: sponsor
dsense.guideword: (advertising) (插有自己产品广告的节目的)

example.eg: The TV channel asked a car manufacturer to be the sponsor of its new drama series.
example.egtrans: 这家电视台邀请一家汽车制造商作为其新连续剧的赞助商。

example.eg: The company sponsored the gifted student during his time at university.
example.egtrans: 公司资助那位资优学生上大学。

dsense.name: sponsor [sth/sb]⇒
dsense.guideword: (advertise to support) (出于广告自己产品的目的)

example.eg: A DIY store sponsors this home improvement programme on the TV.
example.egtrans: 一家“自己动手”商店赞助了这一家居装修电视节目。

example.eg: The senator is sponsoring the bill.
